name: Unseen Lust 0.1 [Update]
description:
Story 

Unseen Lust is a story about a young college student who had a car accident in the way to a party, where he lost his best friend. He went on a 7 months coma which resulted in memory loss. After waking up he moves on with his doctor who never knew she caused the accident. 

Release Date: 12-06-2020

Developer: FlipJoker
Censored: No

Version: 0.1

OS: Windows

Language: English
